resources.string: Could not communicate with the device
You are not authorized to pass
Your pass request is being sent…
You need to enable Bluetooth to continue
You must be in a defined location to continue
Please read the QR code of access point
"In order to scan QR code, you need to give camera access permission to the application. You can make the necessary change by tapping the \'Settings\' button.
Your location needs to be verified before you can continue and you need to grant Location permission to the application. You can make the necessary change by tapping the \'Settings\' button.

Your location needs to be verified before you can continue, and location services must be turned on for this. You can re-scan the QR code after activating the location service by tapping the \'Settings\' button or from the control center.
